column6: said all investors should factor climate change into their decision-making and doing so would not mean having to accept lower returns. column2: Enbridge buying Spectra in $28 bln deal Canada's Enbridge Inc said on Tuesday it would buy Spectra Energy Corp of Houston in an all-stock deal valued at about $28 billion (C$37 billion) to create the largest North American energy infrastructure company.
